nodes.name: finalize

devdoc.author: Andrea Bruno 585457
devdoc.details: The following comments are written using the Solidity NatSpec Format.

activateAuction().details: Only the seller can invoke it.

bid().details: The bidder should send a value greater or equal than the actual price.Finally, the auction passes in a "validation" state, to avoid inconsistencies due to forks on the blockchain

params._initialPrice: is the initial price decided by the seller.
params._itemName: is a short description of what is going to be sold.
params._reservePrice: is the reserve price decided by the seller.

finalize().details: The security pattern Checks-Effects-Interaction is respected.

getActualPrice().details: Since it is public, the gas will be spent by the people willing to know the current price.

devdoc.title: Dutch Auction contract

activateAuction().notice: This function will activate the auction.

bid().notice: Use this function to make a bid.

getActualPrice().notice: This function will update the price.

userdoc.notice: This contract implements the Dutch auction functionalities.
